title: Market Advisors Research Issues a Research Report on Dragon Capital Group Corporation
text: Market Advisors Research Issues a Research Report on Dragon Capital Group Corporation   17:45:26 Market Advisors Research Issues a Research Report on Dragon Capital Group Corporation -- SHANGHAI, October   <-   SHANGHAI , October   Dragon Capital Group Corp. (OTC: DRGV), a holding company of emerging tech companies in China , announced today that Market Advisors Research Issues a Research Report on Dragon Capital Group Corporation. For the entire report, please visit http://www.marketadvisorsinc.com . According to the report, "The small cap space has an abundance of undervalued companies but fundamentals still are at the forefront. DRGV's focused on the development of wireless 3G-based applications and business solutions. They have assembled a sold management team with strong competencies in software development, mobile Internet solutions, manufacturing, engineering solutions, wireless services and information technology. We understand that management will continue to pursue growth opportunities, both internally and by acquisition, utilizing its strong financial condition and its ability to generate internal cash flow. This dragon will be hard to slay if the Company can successfully execute its business plan. The risk versus reward could be phenomenal for investors" About Jeff Helleberg and Doug Wetzel , partners in Market Advisors, Inc. Jeff was the Editor of the Marketarian Letter and a nationally recognized analyst who was quoted as an investment authority in such publications as The Wall Street Journal, Barron's, The Dick Davis Digest, Investors Business Daily, The New York Times , Washington Post and numerous top financial publications. Since 1979, Mr. Helleberg had earned a reputation as one of the nation's top market analysts. Jeff is primarily a value investor that seeks to identify situations in companies paying little attention to market temperament, the political climate or other exterior market conditions. Mr. Wetzel had 17 years of banking, sales and marketing experience and joined with Mr. Helleberg in 1995 as co-editor of The Marketarian Letter and was responsible for attracting new subscribers and companies to be highlighted in the newsletter. About Dragon Capital Group Corporation Dragon Capital Group Corp. (OTC: DRGV ) is doing business in China through its subsidiaries. DRGV was established to serve as a conduit between Chinese tech companies and Western investors. DRGV functions as an incubator of high-tech companies in China , offering support in the critical functions of general business consulting, formation of joint ventures, access to capital, merger & acquisition, business valuation, and revenue growth strategies. DRGV has developed a portfolio of tech companies operating in China .
